ColorfulMod:InspirationPower.NAME: Inspiration
DESCRIPTIONS: Increases the Evoke Effect of #rRed / #gGreen by #b

ColorfulMod:BatchProductPower.NAME: Batch Product
DESCRIPTIONS: At start of turn , Add #b
#rRed and #gGreen #yEmpty to hand.

ColorfulMod:ShinePower.NAME: Shine
DESCRIPTIONS: At start of turn , set #b
card(s) in your hand to #yGold.

ColorfulMod:WellPreparedPower.NAME: Well Prepared
DESCRIPTIONS: At start of next turn , draw #b
extra card and set them to #rRed.

ColorfulMod:FireSpreadPower.NAME: Fire Spread
DESCRIPTIONS: #rRed Evoke Effect now damages ALL enemies.

ColorfulMod:EnlargePower.NAME: Enlarge
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yRed card , gain #b
#yStrength.

ColorfulMod:GoldAcceleratorPower.NAME: Gold Accelerator
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a #b0 cost card for the next #b
time(s) this turn , draw #b1 card.

ColorfulMod:ImaginationPower.NAME: Imagination
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of turn , cost [E] to gain #b
#yInspiration .

ColorfulMod:GlitteringPower.NAME: Glittering
DESCRIPTIONS: When a colored card is #yRetained , trigger its #yWCE #b
time(s).

ColorfulMod:MetallizePaintPower.NAME: Metallize Paint
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce attack damage you take by half for #b
turn(s).

ColorfulMod:LoseInspirationPower.NAME: Lose Inspiration
DESCRIPTIONS: At start of next turn , lose #b
#yInspiration .

ColorfulMod:PlasticityPower.NAME: Plasticity
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play an *Empty , trigger its #yWCE #b
more time(s).

ColorfulMod:MagicPaintPower.NAME: Magic Paint
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you trigger Evoke Effect , deal #b
damage to a random enemy #b
time(s).

ColorfulMod:MagicPaintPlusPower.NAME: Magic Paint+
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you trigger Evoke Effect , deal #b
damage to a random enemy #b
time(s).

ColorfulMod:ColorfulFormPower.NAME: Colorful Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a colored card , set a random card in hand to random color.

ColorfulMod:ColorfulFormPower2.NAME: Colorful Form
DESCRIPTIONS: ALL cards get default color by type.
